Login.error_login: An error occurred while processing your login. Please try again later.
Login.page_intro: Brainstorming is a creativity technique met the purpose of quickly generating new ideas regarding a certain topic or question. The main feature of a brainstorming session is that the value judgement of the proposed ideas is delayed until they are all summed up. Kandoe is the ideal way to accomplish this.
